div1.p: McDonnell outlines the terms by which a new teacher will be appointed in Waynesboro.

div1.head:
Freedmen's Bureau Bureau R. Fr. a.L.
H'qs Sub District Roswell Waldo
div1.p: In reply to your application for a teacher at Waynesboro, I have to state that Mr. Brackett will furnish a teacher on the following terms; the freedmen to board him, furnish fuel + pay him $10 per mo.
Mr. Waring a very intelligent colored man representing another society which is operating in the valley will furnish a teacher if they will pay him $5 per month and fuel etc. for the school.
Please ascertain at once which proposition (if either) they accept. I would of course recommend the latter.

closer.signed:
John A. McDonnell
Sub Asst. Comm.
